data.title: The Ultimate Showman
data.meta_description: Earl Turner is truly the ultimate showman and can do it all. He sings, songwriters, musician, dancer, and storyteller. His high-energy performance will have you on your feet as he pays tribute to musicals greats!
data.text:
In the presence of friends and family, I was humbled and honored to be recognized by the city of Las Vegas. It’s hard to describe the feelings of gratitude for the city I have considered home for over 30 years. My thanks to the city of Las Vegas for this extraordinary honor! And to all the people who have supported me through the years, THANK YOU!

Earl has done it again by being a 2023 VIVA recipient! The Vegas Icon Visionary Award recognizes performance artistry in live music for future generations. Earl’s talent and stewardship exemplify the award, and he could not be a more worthy recipient.”

I am pleased to announce that I won Entertainer of the Year! I’m incredibly grateful for all those who voted for me. This is truly an honor I will cherish. Thank you. I appreciate your help!
